From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Decadel::

      Decadel saw Deemos crawl away and the rest of em go to the Maximal
base.  Then Decadel saw everyone get into the Predacon ship.  hehehe stupid
idiots.  If the maximals didn't kill them, if the Aliiance didn't kill them,
then he would.  And if he didn't, they would win.  And he wouldn't let that
happen.  He didn't need to be in the useless bunch of Predacons.  He fired
his shoulder plasma cannons at Phobia's ship.  To escape the explosion, and
any returning fire, he went beast mode, and underground back to his lair.
Good.  Hell Drak was still where she was supposed to be.  Or so he thought.
----- Original Message -----
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, September 08, 2000 11:12 PM
Subject: Re: Alliance Victory (Well Almost)


>
> Atma reaches Deemos.
>
> "You! Alliance! Stand down, I'm goign to destroy this hunk of junk! If I
> die, then you can kill him." Atma says. Deemos flips out a pistol and
> laughs. Atma raises his hand. Deemos stares at a eerie glow. Atma points
to
> the ground, a light engulfs them both and blasts them both away, Psuedo
was
> also damaged by this. Atma stood up, Deemos was laying there.
>
> "Good day, Alliance." Atma said. He picked up Psuedo and Land Mine and ran
> toward Phobia's ship.
>
> "Wait! I'm going aboard!" Atma called out. Deemos slowly turned over.
>
> "I admit defeat." Deemos said. He started crawling away...
